description.title: Basic helper functionality test
description.purpose: Exercise Blinkt functionality using the correlator helper object. Visible output should be in 5 steps with ~2 seconds pause between each: 1. Rainbow colours at full brightness 2. Step down to zero brightness using global intensity setting 3. Step back up to full brightness using global intensity setting 4. Step up through all 256 grayscale values 5, Step back down through all 256 grayscale values
